GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics
serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article specified by id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of the comments specified by article id

comments.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts an object of comment based on article id returns the posted object

exampleBody.body: this is my comment for the article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes property of the given article based on article_id and returns updated article object
